categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Bounty Hunter Hang Out was a building in the city Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine which was used by Boba Fett's syndicate.

During the Clone Wars, the building was used as a base for Boba Fett's syndicate. The bounty hunters that frequented the building was C-21 Highsinger, Latts Razzi, Embo, Bossk, Dengar and Oked. Before heading to a job on Quarzite they lost Oked in a bar mishap. Embo would not join their mission so Bossk and Razzi brought Oked's killer who had agreed to fill in the position on the job. She said she had no name and was at first irritated at the young leadership of Fett but soon set out to Quarzite with them.

The hang out's exterior and interior was designed by concept artist Carlos Sanches in 2010. It first appearance was in the episode Bounty in the The Clone Wars: Season Four which aired on March 2, 2012. The building was scheduled to appear in an unfinished four-episode arc starring Cad Bane and Boba Fett. Concept art made by David Le Merrer showed that the building had a prison.
